"Your device's hardware components or Android system version may cause compatibility issues and make some apps misbehave, freeze, or be force stopped. If you encounter such issues, share your feedback with the app developers."

"温馨提示：使用小米红包助手后，会提升您抢红包的速度。但如果您手太快，姿势太迅猛，每次都率先抢到红包，<font color='#e56255'>有一定几率会被微信误认为使用了自动抢红包插件</font>，影响您后面使用红包功能。所以，有时候，高抬贵手略控制节奏，抢红包风味更佳。红包虽好，可不要贪多哟～"
"使用小米红包助手后，会提升您抢红包的速度。但如果您手太快，姿势太迅猛，每次都率先抢到红包，<font color='#e56255'>有一定几率会被微信误认为使用了自动抢红包插件</font>，影响您后面使用红包功能。所以，有时候，高抬贵手略控制节奏，抢红包风味更佳。红包虽好，可不要贪多哟～～"

CREATE TABLE AAID( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, package_name TEXT NOT NULL, aaid TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE keyword( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, data TEXT DEFAULT NULL, type INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, cloudUid TEXT DEFAULT NULL, sim_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 );
CREATE TABLE mode( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT DEFAULT NULL, state TEXT DEFAULT NULL );
CREATE TABLE OAID( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, oaid TEXT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE phone_list( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number TEXT DEFAULT NULL, display_number TEXT DEFAULT NULL, notes TEXT DEFAULT NULL, state INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, isdisplay INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, type INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, cloudUid TEXT DEFAULT NULL, sync_dirty INTEGER DEFAULT 0, e_tag TEXT DEFAULT NULL, record_id TEXT DEFAULT NULL, location INTEGER DEFAULT 0, sim_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 );
CREATE TABLE reportSms( id TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE reportSmsPending( id TEXT NOT NULL, address TEXT, body TEXT, date TEXT );
CREATE TABLE sim( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, sim_id TEXT NOT NULL, call_wait TEXT DEFAULT -1, name TEXT DEFAULT NULL, backsound_mode INTEGER DEFAULT 0 );
CREATE TABLE THIRD_DESKTOP( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, package_name TEXT NOT NULL, application_name TEXT NOT NULL, type INTEGER NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE VAID( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, package_name TEXT NOT NULL, vaid TEXT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE fwlog( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number TEXT DEFAULT NULL, date INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, type INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, reason INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, data1 TEXT DEFAULT NULL, data2 TEXT DEFAULT NULL, read INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, simid TEXT DEFAULT -1, mode INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, callType INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 );
For displaying earthquake early warnings relevant to your location
To be able to use our services, allow this app to connect to the internet and grant the permissions listed above.

"If you restrict Security's access to the internet and your location info, you won't be able to receive earthquake warnings, update virus definitions and blocklist info. Your device will become less secure. Restrict anyway?"

Welcome to Security! You can use this app to free up storage space, scan your device for viruses, control battery usage, optimize your device for gaming, manage apps, receive earthquake early warnings, and more.
Allow to connect to the internet and access location
"MIUI will set data limits and apps with unlimited data according to the carrier you select. If your carrier isn't listed, select \"Other\" and set up your daily data plan manually."

Set an emergency contact in Security > Earthquake warning first
Add your medical data in Security > Earthquake warning

<Data>"This feature provides you with earthquake warning functionality. It will notify you about upcoming earthquakes and play warning sound. You'll be able to find the nearest shelter, call your emergency contact, and present your medical card if required. <br>We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies. <br>To be able to work normally, this feature requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information: <br>• Location info: <br>For accessing your location and providing accurate earthquake warnings. <br>If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this feature. You can choose to turn this feature off or not turn it on in such cases. <br>You must read and agree to our <a href=\"http://api.sec.miui.com/res/docs/disclaimer/privacy/earthquake_alert?region=%1$s&lang=%2$s\">Privacy Policy</a> before using this feature."</Data>
Are you an organ donation volunteer?
"Privacy statement: The info you provide here will only be used for emergency cases and stored on your device. We won't upload this info to our servers."

"This feature provides you with earthquake warning functionality. You must understand that the earthquake warning information is provided by a third party early warning agency. Xiaomi doesn't oversee third party agencies and doesn't have any control over them. Xiaomi doesn't promise or guarantee the accuracy, validity, and timeliness of earthquake warning information, nor does it guarantee that the earthquake warning service will meet all your needs. You must understand that this feature is provided for your reference only. You are solely responsible for the risks and consequences of any actions you perform based on the information provided by this feature."

<Data>"This disclaimer applies to all users (hereinafter referred to as you) who turn on the earthquake warning feature. By agreeing to this disclaimer, you enter into a legally binding contract with Xiaomi Inc. and its affiliates (hereinafter referred to as Xiaomi). You acknowledge that you have read all the contents of this disclaimer, and you fully understand and agree to all the terms and conditions of this disclaimer; otherwise, you should turn off the earthquake warning feature immediately.<br> <b>Special statement</b><br> The earthquake warning functionality is available in selected regions now (<a href=\"https://sec-cdn.static.xiaomi.net/secStatic/groups/miui-sec/common/quake-warn/dist/index.html?region=%1$s&lang=%2$s\">Tap to view</a>). More regions will be available soon.<br> <b>Disclaimer</b><br> Earthquake warning features are provided by Xiaomi in the Security app. You must understand that the earthquake warning information is provided by the government early warning agencies. Xiaomi doesn't oversee such agencies and doesn't have any control over them.<br> Xiaomi doesn't promise or guarantee the accuracy, validity, and timeliness of earthquake warning information, nor does it guarantee that the earthquake warning service will meet all your needs.<br> Receiving earthquake warning information requires you to keep your device connected to the mobile network. Third party communication line failures, technical problems, network or terminal equipment failures, system instability, and other various force majeure events might prevent you from receiving earthquake warning information. Xiaomi shall not bear any responsibility for any losses caused by such events.<br> You must understand that this feature is provided for your reference only. The warning you receive might come seconds before the onset of an earthquake. You are solely responsible for the risks and consequences of any actions you perform based on the information provided by this feature.<br>"</Data>

"The system estimates earthquake intensity based on the magnitude of the earthquake, the location of the epicenter, and the distance from you. The greater the intensity of the earthquake, the more devastation the earthquake might bring to your location. When the estimated intensity is greater than 2.0, you'll receive a strong earthquake warning; when the estimated intensity is lower than 2.0, you can choose to receive system notifications."
For earthquakes with intensity lower than 2.0
For earthquakes with intensity of 2.0 and higher

"About this feature: 1. Incoming calls to your data SIM won't interrupt mobile data connection. The connection will be interrupted only when you answer a call. 2. When this feature is turned on, the caller won't hear call waiting ringtones. Incoming calls will be ended unless you answer within 6 seconds. 3. This feature only works for data SIM cards. Calls to your primary SIM will interrupt mobile data connection. 4. This feature is supported only by China Mobile and China Unicom."

"Your device can't connect to the internet:
1. Make sure you haven't exceeded your mobile data plan's limit.
2. If you just topped up your device's balance, reboot your device and try again.
3. Your carrier's network signal may be weak in your current location."
"Couldn't activate SIM card. Make sure your SIM card is inserted properly and that your mobile plan has been activated by your carrier."
"Can't use mobile data to connect to the network"
"Can't use mobile data while roaming to connect to the network."

"There may be a problem with the router you're connected to: "1. Public Wi-Fi network issues" If you're connected to a public Wi-Fi network, the number of users connected to that network may be slowing it down or creating connectivity problems. Switch to another network and try again. "2. Internet service provider issues" Make sure that your account is in good standing with your Internet service provider. "3. Router hardware issues" Try rebooting your router or checking the admin settings for your router. "4. Other router issues" Read the instructions that came with your router and restore your router to its factory settings. "5. Make sure your router is connected properly" Try using another Ethernet cable to connect your router. If you suspect there's an issue with the connection in your home, contact your Internet service provider."

"There may be a problem with your SIM card:
1. Make sure your account is in good standing with your carrier. Try using a friend's SIM card and see if you're able to connect normally.
2. If you're using two SIM cards, try switching to the other card and see if you're able to connect normally.
3. Make sure your SIM card and your device's SIM slot aren't damaged. Confirm that the SIM card you're using is properly inserted in your device's SIM tray."

"After you start the calibration, MIUI will connect to the network, encode your carrier's info, phone number, IMEI, and Mi Account, and upload these items to Mi servers. This is done in order to acquire the carrier's calibration template and learn if it's possible to purchase data in your location.
While calibrating, MIUI will send a text message to your carrier to receive the calibration template."
Privacy protection is the commitment behind the design of our products

We are committed to respecting and protecting your privacy. Prioritizing research and development in the field of information security, Xiaomi constantly works on improving the methods, practices, and technical solutions that safeguard your data. We also share our latest achievements with our partners in order to ensure your privacy across the board.
